Unity AR

Introduction

Visgraph AR is a tool for visualizing and analyzing networks in 3D using the Hololens 2 headset developed by Microsoft. It is a research project developed for a Bachelor’s thesis and afterwards further expanded and improved under supervision of dr. Rob Belleman at the UvA Visualisation Lab.

Getting Started

The application needs access to the camera (for QR recognition) and networking capabilities. Developers can load the application onto the Hololens 2 using Visual Studio. It is designed to run independently from a PC and connects to an active Visgraph session by scanning a QR code. The user generates the QR code by navigating to the Session Tab in the Visgraph application and clicking the Add Headset button, and afterwards, Connect to show the QR code.
